short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful tool that brings real-time weather updates directly to your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

-> Real-Time Weather Updates: Access accurate weather information via integrated APIs.
-> Multi-City Support: Add and monitor weather data for as many cities as you like.
-> Script Injection: Display weather information directly on web pages.
-> Tabs Communication: Ensure consistent weather updates across all open tabs.
-> App Overlay: Easily view weather information with a draggable overlay on any website.
-> Customizable Options: Set your home city and adjust settings through the options page.
-> Right-Click Integration: Quickly add city names via the context menu for added convenience.


Whether youâ€™re planning your day or simply curious about the weather in different locations, the Weather Extension provides all the tools you need in a user-friendly interface. Customize your weather view and stay informed without ever leaving your browser!

Install the Weather Extension today and start enjoying a more connected browsing experience with instant weather updates at your fingertips.
